keyEvents.title: Royal Family Imprisoned
keyEvents.description: The entire Neptune royal family is chained and imprisoned here by the New Fish-Man Pirates with the crew chanting for their deaths.
keyEvents.significance: Represents the complete takeover of Fish-Man Island by Hody Jones.

keyEvents.title: Shyarly's Public Prophecy
keyEvents.description: Madame Shyarly publicly declares that Luffy will destroy Fish-Man Island, not Hody.
keyEvents.significance: This public prophecy undermines Hody's authority before all the citizens gathered at the plaza.

keyEvents.title: Hody's Confession
keyEvents.description: Hody Jones publicly confesses to assassinating Queen Otohime before the assembled crowd and royal family.
keyEvents.significance: The most important revelation of the Fish-Man Island arc happens at this public location, exposing the truth to everyone.

keyEvents.title: Shirahoshi's Revelation
keyEvents.description: Shirahoshi reveals she already knew Hody killed her mother, shocking all witnesses.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the plaza as the stage for truth being revealed - both Hody's confession and Shirahoshi's secret knowledge.

description: A large public plaza on Fish-Man Island where Hody Jones gathers citizens and holds the royal family prisoner to demonstrate his power and make his shocking confession about Otohime's assassination.

keyEvents.title: Vander Decken Lifts Noah
keyEvents.description: Vander Decken IX uses his Devil Fruit power to lift the massive ship Noah and send it toward Fish-Man Island.
keyEvents.significance: Creates the existential threat that will force the Straw Hats to act and potentially fulfill Shyarly's prophecy.

description: A rough district on Fish-Man Island where Vander Decken IX operates and where the ancient ship Noah is located.
